comments.text:
security/db/Makefile
=============================
coreconf_hack:
	cd ../coreconf; gmake
	gmake import

RelEng_bld: coreconf_hack
	gmake


Question #2: are these targets still in use.  Added in 2008, RelEng no longer seems to have any references to the RelEng_bld target in the build scripts.
comments.author: joey@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text: This is part of NSS, which does standalone releases, so it may be used outside of the MoCo Releng setup.
